item.description:
The buy in for each game is $40, and it will be held weekly.

The Poker League is a series of games. The players of each event have their points tallied over a 10 week period. From each game each player puts $10 toward the leagues big game. At the end of the 10 week period you compete for the big prize!

10 players X 10 weeks X 10 bucks = $1000 to win
30 players X 10 weeks X 10 bucks = $3000 to win

You can do the math and there's room for 40 total players in the league. If this kind of event interests you than you should contact me.

Hope to hear from you soon.

Jay - The Host - 617.947.1766.

PS - 13 members are registered for this event.


Tournament Blind Structure:

Starting Stack: 1500 chips
First 2 rounds are 30min
Following Rounds are 20 min

Levels Small Blind Big Blind Antes
1st. 10 20
2nd. 20 40
3rd. 25 50
4th. 50 100
5th. 100 200
6th. 200 400
7th. 300 600
8th. 400 800
9th. 500 1000
10th. 1000 2000
11th. 1500 3000
12th. 2000 4000
13th. 3000 6000
14th. 4000 8000
15th. 5000 10000


For more information, see http://poker.meetup.c...
